0:
Text: Carrott's Lib is a British satirical comedy series broadcast between 9 October 1982 and 30 December 1983.
Triplets:<Carrott's Lib
1:
--------------------
<Text: Carrott's Lib:  It starred Jasper Carrott and a cast of many comedians.>
Triplets:<Carrott's Lib
2:
--------------------
Text: Carrott's Lib:  The show was not just a satirical comedy, it was also a sketch show with many comedians of the future, most famously Chris Barrie ("Red Dwarf", "The Brittas Empire") & Jan Ravens ("Dead Ringers", "Spitting Image").
Triplets:<Carrott's Lib
3:
--------------------
Text: Carrott's Lib:  Unlike most comedy series it was broadcast live, albeit with some pre-recorded elements.
Triplets:<Carrott's Lib
